How to place parcel Sending Request

1. Click the "Request Parcel Pickup ?" option from homepage.

 2. Fill up the following form of from the page

 3. Click the "Send Pickup" option to confirm the request.
Shipping Charge Estimation
The shipping charge will vary depending on item type and weight
What is the delivery charge to ship the product to the warehouse?
There is no delivery charge of shipping the product to the warehouse
Can I avail the service without internet?
No, the parcel shipping request will only be sent when you are online.
Do you have any Emergency/ Helpline contact number?
The Helpline and contact numbers are in our Contact Us Page. You may even reach us via email.
